tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_data (
  feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  feedback_date DATE,
  participant_id INT,
  mentor_id INT,
  supervisor_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_mechanisms (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    mentor_id INT NOT NULL,
    supervisor_id INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE mentors (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mentor_name VARCHAR,
    mentor_email VARCHAR,
    department VARCHAR,
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE feedback_tracking (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mentor_id INT,
    supervisor_id INT,
    date_feedback_received DATE,
    category VARCHAR,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE feedbacks (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mentor_id INT NOT NULL,
    supervisor_id INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_date DATE,
    feedback_text TEXT
);
